search_results.title: Hamdan Ballal
search_results.snippet: Hamdan Ballal Al-Huraini (born 1989) is a Palestinian filmmaker, photographer, agriculturalist, and human rights activist from Susya in the South Hebron Hills

search_results.title: 'No Other Land' Director Hamdan Ballal Released By ...
search_results.snippet: Hamdan Ballal, the Palestinian director who won an Oscar three weeks ago for his documentary film “No Other Land,” was released by Israeli forces Tuesday.
